turn.notes: Transition from front-facing to side view

walk.notes: Side view walk cycle, alternate legs

frame_descriptions.0: idle - front-facing stance, flame hair, arms at sides, charred body with glowing cracks
frame_descriptions.1: turn - 3/4 angle transitioning to side view
frame_descriptions.2: move1 - side view, one leg forward, arm extended, flames trailing back
frame_descriptions.3: move2 - side view, opposite leg forward, walk cycle alternate
frame_descriptions.4: death1 - starting to collapse, flames flickering out
frame_descriptions.5: death2 - mostly collapsed, body breaking apart, pieces scattering
frame_descriptions.7: ash - gray ash pile with glowing red/orange embers, smoke wisps

frame_descriptions.2: move1 - side view with 2-square-wide limbs, maintains bulk
frame_descriptions.3: move2 - side view alternate, thick legs and arms

frame_descriptions.0: idle - front-facing, massive flame crown (crimson/dark red), huge curved horns extending far, heavy brow ridge, evil slanted eyes with slit pupils, broad powerful shoulders
frame_descriptions.2: move1 - side view, 2-square-wide limbs throughout, full bulk preserved
frame_descriptions.3: move2 - side view alternate, thick muscular legs and arms
frame_descriptions.4: death1 - massive form starting to collapse, crimson flames dying
